analyzed: vipāka abyākatam kiriyā abyākatam rūpam nibbānam cakkhu āyatanam pe

original: diṭṭhigatasampayuttā vedanā saññā cetanā cittaṁ akusalanti?
analyzed: diṭṭhi gata sampayuttā vedanā saññā cetanā cittam akusalanti
nanu sa phalam sa vipākam ti

original: Hañci saphalaṁ savipākaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sa phalam sa vipāka no ca vata re vattabbe
nanu micchādiṭṭhi paramāni vajjāni vuttāni bhagavatā ati

original: Hañci micchādiṭṭhiparamāni vajjāni vuttāni bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci micchādiṭṭhi paramāni vajjāni vuttāni bhagavatā no ca vata re vattabbe
micchā diṭṭhi kho vaccha akusalā sammā diṭṭhi kusalā ati

original: “micchādiṭṭhissa kho ahaṁ, puṇṇa, dvinnaṁ gatīnaṁ aññataraṁ gatiṁ vadāmi—
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhissa kho aha puṇṇa dvinnam gatīnam aññataram gatim vadāmi
a sassataḥ lokaḥ ti kho vaccha
tam jīvam tam kho vaccha pe
aññam jīvam aññam sarīran ti kho vaccha pe
hoti tathāgataḥ param kho vaccha pe

original: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha …pe…
analyzed: na hoti tathāgataḥ param kho vaccha pe

original: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha …pe…
analyzed: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgataḥ param kho vaccha pe

original: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha, abyākatametan”ti.
analyzed: na iva hoti na na hoti tathāgataḥ param kho vaccha a byākatam etat ti
tena hi diṭṭhigatam a byākatam ti
micchādiṭṭhikassa bhikkhave purisa puggalassa yat ca iva kāya kammam

original: samādinnaṁ, yañca vacīkammaṁ …pe… yañca manokammaṁ, yā ca cetanā, yā ca patthanā,
analyzed: yat ca vacī kammam pe yat ca manaḥ kamma yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā

original: yo ca paṇidhi, ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya
analyzed: yaḥ ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya a kantāya a manāpāya ahitāya
